note: Requires a entity to be labeled as a captain in a group. An example of this is the `minecraft:is_illager_captain` component used in the `pillager.json` entity definition.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Follow Target Captain Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows mob to move towards its current target captain.

fields.title: Follow Distance
fields.description: Defines the distance in blocks the mob will stay from its target while following.

fields.title: Within Radius
fields.description: Defines the maximum distance in blocks a mob can get from its target captain before giving up trying to follow it.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
